title: Quinoa and black bean chili
ingredients: ['175g uncooked quinoa, rinsed', '500ml water', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '750ml tomato passata', '2 (400g) tins black beans, rinsed and drained', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 courgette, chopped', '1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced', '1 tablespoon minced chipotle peppers in adobo sauce', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '175g frozen corn', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander']
